# perrot

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Behavioral tests and neuronal electrophysiology analysis (linear mixed models) of mice with immune cell transplantation from multiple sclerosis patients.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ecamenen/perrot")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(perrot)
```
